snippet: Thousands of naked Christmas trees have been arranged along the beach in Long Beach, N.Y., as part of an unusual plan to restore the protective dunes washed away by Hurricane Sandy.
abstract: Thousands of naked Christmas trees are arranged along the beach in Long Beach, NY, as part of unusual plan to restore the protective dunes washed away by Hurricane Sandy; trees are supposed to catch sand blown by the wind, until gradually the dunes grow up around them.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of naked Christmas trees have been arranged along the beach in Long Beach, N.Y., as part of an unusual plan to restore the protective dunes washed away by Hurricane Sandy.

headline.seo: On Decimated Shore, a Second Life for Christmas Trees
headline.main: On Decimated Shore, a Second Life for Christmas Trees
headline.print_headline: On Decimated Shore, a Second Life for Christmas Trees
